title: 2022 Clemson Tigers softball team
text:
The 2022 Clemson Tigers softball team is the varsity <a href="college%20softball">college softball</a> team that represents <a href="Clemson%20University">Clemson University</a> during the <a href="2022%20NCAA%20Division%20I%20softball%20season">2022 NCAA Division I softball season</a>. This is the third season of Clemson's softball program. The Tigers compete in the <a href="Atlantic%20Coast%20Conference">Atlantic Coast Conference</a> (ACC) and are led by head coach <a href="John%20Rittman">John Rittman</a>. Clemson plays its home games at <a href="McWhorter%20Stadium">McWhorter Stadium</a> in <a href="Clemson%2C%20South%20Carolina">Clemson, South Carolina</a>.
Previous Season.
The Tigers finished their first full season as a program 44–8 and 29–5 in ACC play to finish in first place and claim the regular season championship. As the first seed in the <a href="2021%20Atlantic%20Coast%20Conference%20Softball%20Tournament">ACC Tournament</a>, they defeated and before losing to in the Final. They earned an at-large bid to the <a href="2021%20NCAA%20Division%20I%20Softball%20Tournament">NCAA Tournament</a> and were placed into the <a href="2021%20NCAA%20Division%20I%20Softball%20Tournament%23Tuscaloosa%20Super%20Regional">Tuscaloosa Regional</a>. There they defeated <a href="2021%20Troy%20Trojans%20softball%20team">Troy</a> twice, but lost to <a href="2021%20Alabama%20Crimson%20Tide%20softball%20team">Alabama</a> twice to end their season.
